name: shetland
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a group of islands northeast of Scotland and Orkney, that is a council area (= an area with its own local government) of Scotland: a fisherman from Burra, Shetland The company employs about 130 people in the Shetland Islands.
More examplesFewer examplesShetland is one of the best places in the world to see big seabird colonies.Locals dressed as Vikings marched through Lerwick, in Shetland, to celebrate the annual festival of fire.My first job was packing fish in the Shetland Islands.
